Sequence Information.Source: Reltecimod is under investigation in clinical trial NCT02469857 (Phase III Efficacy and Safety Study of AB103 in the Treatment of Patients With Necrotizing Soft Tissue Infections).
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found on DRAMP database
Reference: Resolution of organ dysfunction as a predictor of long-term survival in necrotizing soft tissue infections: Analysis of the AB103 Clinical Composite Endpoint Study in Necrotizing Soft Tissue Infections trial and a retrospective claims database-linked chart study.(PMID:33797490)
